title: The Hatter's Game: Part II
description:
ABOUT THIS EPISODE  Malcolm Khalaji is missing.  And Seong-Jae Yoon is the only one who can find him.  But to do so means walking paths he swore he would never tread again. Descending into the blackest hallways of a twisted and sadistic mind. Breaking down every wall he's ever built around himself, to try to predict what Sila will do next.  Yet not even Seong-Jae can anticipate the outcome of this deadly game.  One chance.  One choice.  Will Seong-Jae sacrifice himself to save Malcolm...  ...or become the monster that Sila knows him to be?  
Part Two of the explosive finale and the climactic ending to Season One!
author: Cole McCade
